snippet: Brig. Gen. Ahmad Vahidi, Iran’s defense minister, says the Fateh-110 has a range of 185 miles and improved accuracy for land and sea targets.
abstract: Iran's Brig Gen Ahmad Vahidi says that country has successfully test-fired an upgraded version of a short-range ballistic missile with improved accuracy, increasing its capacity to strike land and naval targets.
lead_paragraph: Brig. Gen. Ahmad Vahidi, Iran’s defense minister, says the Fateh-110 has a range of 185 miles and improved accuracy for land and sea targets.

headline.seo: Iran Says Test of Upgraded Short-Range Missile Was a Success
headline.main: Iran Says Test-Firing of Missile a Success
headline.print_headline: Iran Says Test-Firing Of Missile a Success
